## MotionOptions.baseUrl property

Base URL of the API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
baseUrl?: string;
```

## Remarks

Base URL the client should target. Useful to override in development.

Motion provides a mock API at [motionMockBaseUrl](./motion-sdk.motionmockbaseurl.md)<!-- -->.
